trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Solina's eyes implore you to aid in her search.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_TODO_00<tab>Search Cracked Shell Beach for a silky-haired elf with a gorgeous smile.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_TODO_01<tab>Rescue the silky-haired elf.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the silky-haired elf in the Derelicts.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_000<tab>Thank you for agreeing to help. I know that he's out there, somewhere. I <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it.

TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_001<tab>I should check belowdecks again... While I do, could you search the Kholusian coast in my stead? I've been thinking that he may have washed up there, but... Well, it's crawling with vicious creatures, and I do have <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> sense of self-preservation.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_002<tab>Look for an elf of about my age. You'll know him when you see him, I'm sure─he has silky hair and the most <var 1A 02 /var>gorgeous<var 1A 01 /var> smile!

TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_010<tab>I'm saved! I was so tired after swimming to shore, you see, that I crawled over here and dropped off to sleep... I'm sure you can imagine my horror upon seeing those visages when I awoke!
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_011<tab>I've worried Solina? I had no idea I'd been gone so long...
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_012<tab>Of course I will return to Eulmore immediately. Please, join us there─I'm sure she'll want to thank you for all you've done.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_ELFBOY03517_000_013<tab>I can't say that I know any Solina... Unless that would get me into Eulmore? In which case, I <var 1A 02 /var>definitely<var 1A 01 /var> know her.

TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_ELFBOY03517_000_014<tab>You've the wrong person, I'm afraid. So many fled the city in the wake of what happened... You may have a rather difficult time tracking down anyone in particular.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_020<tab>Solina, how glad I am to see you well!
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_021<tab>You... You're alright! Oh, what a relief...
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_022<tab>Of course I am. I wouldn't leave you all alone.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_023<tab>You had better not!
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_024<tab>You really brought him back. I don't know how to thank you.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_025<tab>Still, I'm surprised that the Queen Bee sent you. Perhaps he wasn't as angry as I thought.

TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_026<tab>I used to work at the Beehive as well, you see─but when the Queen Bee found out about our relationship... Things became rather heated. I quit, and have been eking out a living here ever since.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_027<tab>I didn't expect him to understand, but...he did help, when no one else would. So I will return to the Beehive, as promised, and I'll work harder than ever!
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_BOYFRIEND03517_000_028<tab>For my part...allow me to provide the reward you were offered, along with my sincere gratitude. It's the least I can do.
TEXT_LUCKZH007_03517_SOLINA_000_029<tab>My love, is it truly you?
